description:
Targeted at graduate students. The course
introduces the state-of-the-art AI approaches
with selected topics, from e.g. data analytics and
visualization, statistical modeling, machine
learning, DNN to text mining, as well as selected
topics in FinTech, from e.g. asset allocation to
sentiment analysis. Besides lecturers, academic
researchers and industry professionals will be
invited to come to share their latest research,
their understandings and outlooks of data
science techniques and knowledge and their
applications in financial services.
title: AI and FinTech
